summary: Upon hearing his wife was killed in the Iraq war, a father takes his two daughters on a road trip.
cast: John Cusack|Emily Churchill|Rebecca Spence|Jennifer Tyler|Susan Messing|Shélan O'Keefe|Gracie Bednarczyk|Doug Dearth|Doug James|Alessandro Nivola|Zach Gray|Marisa Tomei|Penny Slusher|Dana Lynne Gilhooley|Mary Kay Place|Katie Honaker|Ross Klavan|Robb Pruitt|Bill Timoney|Jennifer Bills|Nathan Adloff|Brian Patrick Farrell|Andrea Frisby|Shane Hartline|Suzanne Lang|Gary Sedlock|Jocelyn Wesler
keywords: road trip|amusement park|death of loved one|death|eulogy
director: Director: Jim Strouse (as James C. Strouse)
title: La vida sin Grace
